    • setSaucelabsProperties

      private static void setSaucelabsProperties(org.openqa.selenium.MutableCapabilities options)
      Searches for a saucelabsConfigs value containing a comma delimited list of properties and values in the form -DsaucelabsConfigs="parent-tunnel=myTunnel, tunnelIdentifier=tunnelID"
      Parameters:
      options - MutableCapabilities the capabilities object that stores all the properties for creating a RemoteWebDriver

    • setSaucelabsProperty

      private static void setSaucelabsProperty(String saucelabsPropertyName, String saucelabsProperty, org.openqa.selenium.MutableCapabilities options)
      Sets a single Saucelabs property.
      Parameters:
      saucelabsPropertyName - String the property name
      saucelabsProperty - String the value to set
      options - MutableCapabilities the capabilities object that stores all the properties for creating a RemoteWebDriver
